description: Extensión de paguertrading.com para ejecutar la estrategia BB maker en BitMEX.
name: Bitmex BB-Maker
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval'; script-src-elem 'self' data: blob:; worker-src https://*.bitmex.com/* 'self' data: blob:; media-src https://*.bitmex.com/* 'self' blob:; object-src 'self'; child-src https://*.bitmex.com/* 'self' data: blob:
